name: Activiti
description: Activiti is a light-weight workflow and Business Process Management (BPM) Platform targeted at business people, developers and system admins. Its core is a super-fast and rock-solid BPMN 2 process engine for Java.

name: Drools
description: A rule engine, DMN engine and complex event processing (CEP) engine for Java.

name: Flowable
description: A compact and highly efficient workflow and Business Process Management (BPM) platform for developers, system admins and business users.
